entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
